title: Baba Mama Xiaoshihou De Gushi
title_japanese: 爸爸妈妈小时候的故事
synopsis: Time flies, the era of material scarcity is far away from us, and the happiness of those youths is deeply buried in our hearts by our generation. As parents, do we still remember the youth of you and me-those who have passed away Childhood memories? Listen to a story and experience an old time; appreciate an animation and reminiscence the whole childhood. Revisiting "The Story of Mom and Dad When They Are Children", to find who I was once. Let the memory wings fly lightly, to trace the long-lasting but true happiness. (translated from iqiyi)
